name: HorseEntityHelper
description: The `HorseEntityHelper` class provides specialized functionality for interacting with horse entities in Minecraft. This helper offers access to horse-specific properties including variant information, taming status, equipment, and performance statistics like speed and jump height. It extends `AbstractHorseEntityHelper` and inherits comprehensive methods for managing horse ownership, breeding, and combat attributes.
overview:
Horses are tamable passive mobs that can be ridden by players after taming and equipping with a saddle. They come in different color variants with marking patterns, and each horse has randomized stats for health, speed, and jump strength that determine their overall quality for riding and transportation.

This class is typically obtained through entity events, world queries, or by casting from `EntityHelper` using the `asAnimal()` method when dealing with horse entities.

constructors.description: HorseEntityHelper instances are not typically created directly by scripters. Instead, they are obtained through entity-related events (e.g., `EntityInteract`, `EntitySpawn`), world entity queries and filtering for horse entities, type casting from `EntityHelper` using `asAnimal()` when appropriate, or methods that return horse entities from other helpers.

methods.name: getVariant
methods.description: Returns the raw integer value representing the horse's variant (color and markings). This value needs to be decoded to understand the horse's appearance.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Get the UUID of the horse's owner, or null if unowned

methods.name: isTame
methods.description: Check if the horse is tamed

methods.name: isAngry
methods.description: Check if the horse is angry (will not accept taming attempts)

methods.name: isBred
methods.description: Check if the horse was bred by players

methods.name: isSaddled
methods.description: Check if the horse has a saddle equipped

methods.name: canWearArmor
methods.description: Check if the horse can wear horse armor

methods.name: canBeSaddled
methods.description: Check if the horse can be saddled

methods.name: getInventorySize
methods.description: Get the size of the horse's inventory

methods.name: getSpeedStat
methods.description: Get the horse's movement speed attribute value

methods.name: getHorseSpeed
methods.description: Get the horse's speed in blocks per second

methods.name: getJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get the horse's jump strength attribute value

methods.name: getHorseJumpHeight
methods.description: Get the horse's maximum jump height

methods.name: getHealthStat
methods.description: Get the horse's maximum health value

methods.name: getMaxSpeedStat
methods.description: Get possible speed stat range

methods.name: getMinSpeedStat
methods.description: Get possible speed stat range

methods.name: getMaxJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get possible jump strength range

methods.name: getMinJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Get possible jump strength range

methods.name: getMaxHealthStat
methods.description: Get possible health stat range

methods.name: getMinHealthStat
methods.description: Get possible health stat range

methods.name: isFood
methods.description: Check if an item can be used to feed/breed the horse

methods.name: canBreedWith
methods.description: Check if two horses can breed together

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The other animal to check for breeding compatibility

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Current health

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Maximum health

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.description: Equipment (though horses typically don't use these)

methods.name: getOffHand
methods.description: Equipment (though horses typically don't use these)

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Active status effects

methods.name: isBaby
methods.description: Check if the horse is a foal

methods.name: getArmor
methods.description: Current armor value

methods.name: getPos
methods.description: Position information

methods.name: getX
methods.description: X coordinate of the entity's position

methods.name: getY
methods.description: Y coordinate of the entity's position

methods.name: getZ
methods.description: Z coordinate of the entity's position

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Entity identification (e.g., display name)

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Entity identification (e.g., entity registry ID)

methods.name: isAlive
methods.description: Check if the entity is alive

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Distance to another entity

methods.name: getFacingDirection
methods.description: Movement direction

methods.name: getVehicle
methods.description: The entity this entity is riding, or null

methods.name: getPassengers
methods.description: List of entities riding this entity

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Unique identifier

methods.name: asAnimal
methods.description: Casts this EntityHelper to an AnimalEntityHelper if it represents an animal.
